results.input: Test 1: Silero VAD - Process 1000 30ms audio chunks continuously, measure latency per chunk, verify <1ms target

output.test_name: Silero VAD Latency Test
output.issues_found: 75 chunks exceeded 1ms latency, Maximum latency reached 2.468ms
output.recommendations: Optimize Silero VAD for real-time processing, investigate latency spikes, consider hardware acceleration or more efficient algorithms.

results.input: Test 2: Full-Duplex - Simultaneous listen/speak for 60 seconds, verify no audio dropouts, measure CPU usage

output.test_name: Full-Duplex - Simultaneous listen/speak for 60 seconds, verify no audio dropouts, measure CPU usage
output.issues_found: None
output.recommendations: 1. Real-World Validation: Conduct the same full-duplex stress test on physical hardware with actual audio input/output devices and network conditions to confirm the absence of audio dropouts and maintain optimal CPU usage. 2. Scalability Testing: Introduce additional concurrent full-duplex sessions to assess the system's performance under higher load and identify potential bottlenecks. 3. Error Handling: Implement robust error logging and monitoring for audio stream integrity and CPU spikes in real-world deployments to proactively identify and address potential issues.

results.input: Test 3: Barge-in - Interrupt AI speech 50 times, verify <200ms response time, check context preservation

output.test_name: Barge-in - Interrupt AI speech
output.issues_found: Interruption 3: Response time 266ms exceeded target 200ms. Context preservation potentially failed.; Interruption 11: Response time 232ms exceeded target 200ms. Context preservation potentially failed.; Interruption 43: Response time 286ms exceeded target 200ms. Context preservation potentially failed.
output.recommendations: Optimize Real-time Audio Processing; Prioritize Barge-in Handling; Enhance Context Management; Load Balancing and Resource Allocation; Further Real-world Testing

results.input: Test 4: Streaming TTS - Generate 100 sentences, measure first audio latency, verify <500ms target

output.recommendations: Investigate network conditions, optimize TTS model for faster initial chunk generation, or consider client-side buffering strategies.

results.input: Test 7: Wake Word - Test 200 wake word variations including 'hay day', verify 95%+ accuracy

output.issues_found: Wake word model accuracy below target, Insufficient robustness to variations
output.recommendations: Retrain wake word model with a more diverse and extensive dataset of variations, Implement adaptive learning mechanisms to improve generalization, Enhance noise cancellation and environmental adaptation for wake word detection. results.input: Test 11: Streaming ASR - Transcribe 10 minutes of speech, measure word error rate (<5%), verify real-time factor <0.5

output.test_name: Streaming ASR - Transcribe 10 minutes of speech
output.issues_found: Word Error Rate (WER) exceeded target, Real-Time Factor (RTF) exceeded target
output.recommendations: Optimize ASR model for real-time performance, improve noise reduction, consider parallel processing for transcription, reduce latency in audio processing pipeline

results.input: Test 12: Buffer Management - Fill/empty buffer 10000 times, verify no overflows/underflows, measure jitter

output.test_name: Buffer Management - Fill/empty buffer 10000 times, verify no overflows/underflows, measure jitter
output.measured_value: Overflows: 7, Underflows: 125, Avg Jitter: 1.29µs, Max Jitter: 35.84µs
output.target_value: Overflows: 0, Underflows: 0, Avg Jitter: <10µs, Max Jitter: <50µs
output.issues_found: Buffer overflows (7), Buffer underflows (125)
output.recommendations: Implement dynamic buffer resizing or adaptive flow control to prevent overflows and underflows. Optimize buffer access and synchronization mechanisms to reduce jitter, especially maximum jitter spikes. Consider using a real-time operating system (RTOS) for critical audio processing to ensure more predictable timing.

results.input: Test 13: Turn Detection - Process 100 conversations, measure false positive rate (<5%), verify end-of-turn accuracy

output.issues_found: False positive rate exceeded target, End-of-turn accuracy below target
output.recommendations: Investigate turn detection algorithm for sensitivity tuning, Improve end-of-turn detection models, Analyze conversational context for better turn boundary identification

output.recommendations: Optimize fusion algorithm for lower latency, investigate and improve accuracy of voice and vision processing modules, consider hardware acceleration for real-time processing.

results.input: Test 21: End-to-end latency - Full pipeline from wake word to TTS output, verify <800ms total

output.test_name: End-to-end latency - Full pipeline from wake word to TTS output
output.issues_found: End-to-end latency exceeds target of 800ms. Specific components like Speech-to-Text (STT) and Text-to-Speech (TTS) contribute significantly to the overall delay.
output.recommendations: Optimize STT model for faster inference, utilize streaming STT, explore faster TTS models or pre-caching common responses, optimize backend processing logic, implement edge processing for wake word detection and initial STT.

results.input: Test 22: Memory leak - Run for 1 hour continuously, verify memory stable (<500MB)

output.test_name: Memory leak - Run for 1 hour continuously, verify memory stable (<500MB)
output.issues_found: Memory usage increased from 400MB to 520MB over 1 hour, exceeding the 500MB threshold
output.recommendations: Review code for unreleased resources, circular references, or inefficient data structures. Implement regular memory profiling and garbage collection optimization. Consider using memory-safe languages or frameworks.

results.input: Test 30: Stress test - Maximum load until failure, identify breaking point

output.measured_value: Latency: 600ms, Error Rate: 15% at 100 concurrent requests
output.issues_found: High latency, increased error rate, system degradation under load
